Text:
Good DVD SCREENER and a fast download...
A/9
V/8.5
Has screener watermark "Property of Lionsgate. For Awards Consideration Only" that pop's up now and again but this does not spoil the movie in anyway...
Good copy and an Excellent movie... 
Many Thanx to MovieCom-se and TWiZTED for the Great rip and Thanx to all the seeders for a quick download...:)

Thanks For The Up!

@richardpa - Thanks For The Information!
is this on an r5 multifile ... i have no idea how to burn those

@ spydrz - It is an Rar File! 1st you will need to use Winrar or Winzip to Unrar these files (or unpack them). Once you have unpack both files CD1 and CD2, you can use a File Joiner to combine the 2 files. Now you can use convertoDvd and the burn to Dvd...Enjoy!
